beer.name: Mandeau Man Ruby Red
beer.description: This deep red ale is named after one of Steves' favorite mandolin players, Jimmy Gaudreau, who has played with Tony Rice, J. D. Crowe, Robin & Linda Williams, Chesapeake, Bennet Auldridge and Gaudreau, and many aother notable bluegrass players. Malt is in the forefront balanced nicely by English and North American hops.
